channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: WITHIN THE FRAME [R]
channel.desc: Ranging from politics, economy, foreign policy and culture, \"Within the Frame\" is a daily in-depth analysis show, delving deeper into different topics every day.With a panel of experts, \"Within the Frame\" will delve deeper into the headlines of the week, providing for premium news analysis in an easy, well-trimmed manner. Tune into \"Within the Frame.\".
